alert.note: Alert for Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 7:41AM CDT until March 26 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Douglas, Webster and Wright. * WHEN...Until 330 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 741 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated that between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Bryant Creek at County Road 223, Wolf Creek at Highway AB, Beaver Creek at County Road 524, Little Beaver Creek at County Road 447, Cowskin Creek at Highway Y, Bryant Creek at Highway U and Fox Creek at County Road 246. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
